title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with Docker-like UX.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM & Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints; supports chat, pull, delete, copy.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool for chatting, managing models, and monitoring Ollama server.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama-camouflage
summary: Proxy that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints to any Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local models through Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and development shells.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repository tracking community SDKs (Go, Rust, C#, Swift, etc.).

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.
